description: How frequently does the farmer exchange information with agricultural extensionists?
How effective does the farmer perceive associations or organizations are in supporting business ventures?
Is the farmer or other household members part of any association or organization?
Number of different information sources the farmer uses regarding farm management.
Distance to the closest accessible and functioning road suitable for cars (in minutes).
Name of the main crop produced by the household.
Has any household member participated in a research or development project in the last 12 months?
Number of household members working permanently in farming activities per hectare.
To what extent does the household contribute to decision-making in managing the community's land and natural resources?
How frequently does the household participate in activities or meetings related to the management of the community's land and natural resources?
